actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Stockman. Petition No: 104-10.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 464) to repeal the prohibitions relating to semiautomatic assault weapons and large capacity ammunition feeding devices.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 464 (repeal of prohibitions on semiautomatic assault weapons and ammunition feeding devices).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 464) to repeal the prohibitions relating to semiautomatic assault weapons and large capacity ammunition feeding devices.
